86.movie_plot: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

15.movie_plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

126.movie_plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

17.movie_plot: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

116.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

57.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

109.movie_plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

107.movie_plot: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.
